description: Try our easy to follow Prawn Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Prawn salad,Pescatarian,Prawn,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Easter
name: Prawn Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 800g cooked tiger prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact

recipeInstructions.text: Divide watermelon cubes, fennel and prawns among serving plates. Top with fennel or dill and mint leaves.
For the dressing, combine all the ingredients in a screwtop jar. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Shake until well combined.
Pour the dressing over the salad just before serving.
